name: Everybody's PEASANT (Tumblr)
description: Switches the "Followers" text for a "Peasants" text on your tumblr dashboard. I don't promise any future support, it should work as is.
additional_info:
http://aetiusrex.tumblr.com

0.2
Rewrote the code. Took some reverse engineering from other userstyles (read: "Real" Post Counts) to get it working smoothly. Sadly, that means it conflicts with that style if you update it for the new tumblr look.
